description: Microsoft Excel is a powerful spreadsheet application for data analysis, calculations, and visualization, enabling users to organize and process data with formulas, charts, and pivot tables

capabilities.name: EXCEL_ADD_CHART
capabilities.description: Add a chart to a worksheet using Microsoft Graph API.

capabilities.name: EXCEL_ADD_SHAREPOINT_WORKSHEET
capabilities.description: Add a new worksheet to a SharePoint Excel workbook using Microsoft Graph Sites API.

capabilities.name: EXCEL_ADD_TABLE
capabilities.description: Create a new table in a worksheet using the Microsoft Graph API.

capabilities.name: EXCEL_ADD_TABLE_COLUMN
capabilities.description: Add a column to a table using Microsoft Graph API.

capabilities.name: EXCEL_ADD_TABLE_ROW
capabilities.description: Add a row to a table using Microsoft Graph API.

capabilities.name: EXCEL_ADD_WORKBOOK_PERMISSION
capabilities.description: Tool to grant access to a workbook via invite. Use when you need to share a specific workbook file with designated recipients and roles.

capabilities.name: EXCEL_ADD_WORKSHEET
capabilities.description: Add a new worksheet to an Excel workbook using Microsoft Graph API.

capabilities.name: EXCEL_APPLY_TABLE_FILTER
capabilities.description: Apply a filter to a table column using Microsoft Graph API.

capabilities.name: EXCEL_APPLY_TABLE_SORT
capabilities.description: Apply a sort to a table using Microsoft Graph API.

capabilities.name: EXCEL_CLEAR_RANGE
capabilities.description: Tool to clear values, formats, or contents in a specified worksheet range. Use when you need to reset cells before adding new data.

capabilities.name: EXCEL_CLEAR_TABLE_FILTER
capabilities.description: Clear a filter from a table column using Microsoft Graph API.

capabilities.name: EXCEL_CLOSE_SESSION
capabilities.description: Tool to close an existing Excel workbook session. Use when you need to explicitly end a persistent session to release workbook locks.

capabilities.name: EXCEL_CONVERT_TABLE_TO_RANGE
capabilities.description: Convert a table to a range using Microsoft Graph API.

capabilities.name: EXCEL_CREATE_WORKBOOK
capabilities.description: Tool to create a new Excel workbook file at a specified drive path. Generates a new .xlsx file with specified worksheets and data, then uploads it to OneDrive.

capabilities.name: EXCEL_DELETE_TABLE_COLUMN
capabilities.description: Delete a column from a table using Microsoft Graph API.

capabilities.name: EXCEL_DELETE_TABLE_ROW
capabilities.description: Delete a row from a table using Microsoft Graph API.

capabilities.name: EXCEL_DELETE_WORKSHEET
capabilities.description: Tool to delete a worksheet from the workbook. Use when cleaning up unused or temporary sheets after verifying no dependencies exist. Example: "Delete 'Sheet2' after review."

capabilities.name: EXCEL_GET_CHART_AXIS
capabilities.description: Tool to retrieve a specific axis from a chart. Use when you need properties like min, max, interval, and formatting of the chart axis.

capabilities.name: EXCEL_GET_CHART_DATA_LABELS
capabilities.description: Tool to retrieve the data labels object of a chart. Use when you need to inspect label settings like position, separator, and visibility flags after creating or updating a chart.

capabilities.name: EXCEL_GET_CHART_LEGEND
capabilities.description: Tool to retrieve the legend object of a chart. Use after creating or updating a chart when you need to inspect legend visibility and formatting.

capabilities.name: EXCEL_GET_RANGE
capabilities.description: Get a range from a worksheet using Microsoft Graph API.

capabilities.name: EXCEL_GET_SESSION
capabilities.description: Create a session for an Excel workbook using Microsoft Graph API.

capabilities.name: EXCEL_GET_SHAREPOINT_RANGE
capabilities.description: Get a range from a worksheet in SharePoint using Microsoft Graph Sites API.

capabilities.name: EXCEL_GET_SHAREPOINT_WORKSHEET
capabilities.description: Get a worksheet by name or ID from a SharePoint Excel workbook using Microsoft Graph Sites API.

capabilities.name: EXCEL_GET_TABLE_COLUMN
capabilities.description: Tool to retrieve a specific column from a workbook table. Use when you need to fetch column properties and data by its ID or name.

capabilities.name: EXCEL_GET_WORKBOOK
capabilities.description: Tool to retrieve the properties and relationships of a workbook. Use when you need to inspect comments, names, tables, or worksheets.

capabilities.name: EXCEL_GET_WORKSHEET
capabilities.description: Get a worksheet by name or ID from an Excel workbook using Microsoft Graph API.

capabilities.name: EXCEL_INSERT_RANGE
capabilities.description: Tool to insert a new cell range into a worksheet, shifting existing cells down or right. Use when you need to create space for new content without overwriting.

capabilities.name: EXCEL_LIST_CHARTS
capabilities.description: List charts in a worksheet using Microsoft Graph API.

capabilities.name: EXCEL_LIST_CHART_SERIES
capabilities.description: Tool to list all data series in a chart. Use when you need to enumerate chart series for further analysis.

capabilities.name: EXCEL_LIST_COMMENTS
capabilities.description: Tool to list comments in an Excel workbook. Use when you need to retrieve all workbook comments via Microsoft Graph API.

capabilities.name: EXCEL_LIST_FILES
capabilities.description: List files and folders in a drive root or specified path.

capabilities.name: EXCEL_LIST_NAMED_ITEMS
capabilities.description: List named items in a workbook using Microsoft Graph API.

capabilities.name: EXCEL_LIST_SHAREPOINT_TABLES
capabilities.description: List tables in a SharePoint worksheet using Microsoft Graph Sites API.

capabilities.name: EXCEL_LIST_SHAREPOINT_WORKSHEETS
capabilities.description: List worksheets in an Excel workbook stored in SharePoint using Microsoft Graph Sites API.

capabilities.name: EXCEL_LIST_TABLE_COLUMNS
capabilities.description: List columns in a table using Microsoft Graph API.

capabilities.name: EXCEL_LIST_TABLE_ROWS
capabilities.description: List rows in a table using Microsoft Graph API.

capabilities.name: EXCEL_LIST_TABLES
capabilities.description: List tables in a worksheet using Microsoft Graph API. This action retrieves information about all tables present in a specified worksheet of an Excel file. It requires the file ID and worksheet name or ID, and can optionally use a session ID for workbook operations.

capabilities.name: EXCEL_LIST_WORKBOOK_PERMISSIONS
capabilities.description: Tool to list permissions set on the workbook file. Use when you need to see which users or links have access to a specific Excel file by supplying its drive and item IDs. Example: "List permissions for workbook with drive_id 'b!abc123' and item_id '0123456789abcdef'."

capabilities.name: EXCEL_LIST_WORKSHEETS
capabilities.description: List worksheets in an Excel workbook using Microsoft Graph API.

capabilities.name: EXCEL_MERGE_CELLS
capabilities.description: Merge cells in a worksheet range using Microsoft Graph API.

capabilities.name: EXCEL_PROTECT_WORKSHEET
capabilities.description: Tool to protect a worksheet using optional protection options. Use when you need to prevent editing certain parts of a sheet before sharing. Example: "Protect 'Sheet1' to lock formatting and sorting."

capabilities.name: EXCEL_SORT_RANGE
capabilities.description: Sort a range in a worksheet using Microsoft Graph API.

capabilities.name: EXCEL_UPDATE_CHART
capabilities.description: Update a chart in a worksheet using Microsoft Graph API.

capabilities.name: EXCEL_UPDATE_CHART_LEGEND
capabilities.description: Tool to update formatting or position of a chart legend. Use when adjusting legend settings after confirming chart and worksheet exist.

capabilities.name: EXCEL_UPDATE_RANGE
capabilities.description: Update a range in a worksheet using Microsoft Graph API.

capabilities.name: EXCEL_UPDATE_SHAREPOINT_RANGE
capabilities.description: Update a range in a SharePoint worksheet using Microsoft Graph Sites API.

capabilities.name: EXCEL_UPDATE_TABLE
capabilities.description: Update a table in a workbook using Microsoft Graph API.

capabilities.name: EXCEL_UPDATE_WORKSHEET
capabilities.description: Update worksheet properties (name, position) in an Excel workbook using Microsoft Graph API.
